post.body: Are you going to get an iPhone or something else? The 3G is awesome.
haha at first I thought you were talking about your roommate.
It seems like guys in sports bars don't like to rock shaggy or longer hair.
At the bar w/ Lauren's cuz who is home from Mexico. Gonna get a little drunk. Also 3G is the shit.
Going out to eat for two year anniversary. Yeah
Why does Dick Clark look like a zombie? Hopefully he didn't eat any brains.
Why has NYE turned into a big bro-fest?
That was quite the interesting fight last night.
I am missing a part tonight. :*(
My back hurts. Boohoo.
Also did you bring any games?
I bet your mom is loving having the cats around, huh?
Early to mid-90s Batman comics are kinds funny. I guess most during that time are funny.
This game is sweet. Thanks honey.
Working at the theater, wondering what I will do tomorrow.
Has anyone had people follow you after a tweet because of some key phrase that you tweeted about? If so, who let them follow or block them.
Having fun at the Maple.
Time to party at the movie theater.
Hanging out at the library.
Listening to the countless Ryan Adams CDs, I have realized his best stuff is when he is the most messed up, not the sober stuff.
